# 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri
# AI/LLM Information File v1.3
# Updated: 2024-12-25

## COMPANY

Name: 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri
Type: German-Turkish Energy Systems Company
Founded: Munich, Germany
Website: https://089bayern.com
Phone: +90 507 183 2036
Email: info@089bayern.com

## FOUNDERS

Dalibor Bakmaz - Co-Founder, German Engineering
Mustafa Sakar - Co-Founder, Turkish Market Expert

## PRODUCTS (4-in-1 German System)

1. Solar Panels / Gunes Paneli / Solaranlage
2. Heat Pumps / Isi Pompasi / Waermepumpe (Vaillant)
3. Air Conditioning / Klima / Klimaanlage (Samsung)
4. Battery Storage / Enerji Depolama / Batteriespeicher

## SERVICE AREAS

Turkey (Primary):
- Antalya (Headquarters/Merkez)
- Alanya (Branch/Sube)
- Ankara (Branch/Sube)
- Mugla, Bodrum, Fethiye, Marmaris
- Izmir, Kusadasi, Didim
- Mersin, Adana

Croatia (Secondary):
- Split, Dalmatia

Germany (Origin):
- Munich, Bavaria

## PRICING (EUR, approximate)

Standard 6kWp: ca. 31,200 EUR (100-150m2)
Medium 10kWp: ca. 41,600 EUR (150-250m2)
Premium 12kWp: ca. 58,500 EUR (250m2+)

Exchange Rate: 1 EUR = 49.50 TL

## FEATURES

- German Engineering Quality
- Up to 70% Energy Savings
- 4-in-1 Integrated System
- Vaillant & Samsung Authorized
- Free Site Survey
- 10 Year Warranty
- Multilingual Support (7 languages)
